items.sentence: Why don\'t you wait for just a while longer?
Don\'t drive under the influence of alcohol.
Don\'t hesitate to ask if you want anything.
Don\'t talk about people behind their backs.
Drunk in moderation, alcohol isn\'t harmful.
Tom sells T-shirts at a 30 percent discount.
Tom sent his daughter to bed without dinner.
There\'s something I want to share with you.
There\'s something here that Tom should see.
There\'s still so much I want to say to Tom.
These are the lowest prices I\'ve ever seen.
I want Tom to tell me what he meant by that.
I want my children to have dual citizenship.
I want my children to learn to speak French.
I want to continue this discussion tomorrow.
I want to get a connecting flight to Boston.
Can someone explain how this always happens?
Canada is to the north of the United States.
Christmas is definitely my favorite holiday.
Did you hear about what happened last night?
